channel.title: Readings on Cancer Genetics
channel.description: Recent content in Readings on Cancer Genetics

item.title: Hallmarks everywhere
item.description: Required Hanahan and Weinberg (2011) The Hallmarks of Cancer: Next Generation. Cell Hanahan (2022) Hallmarks of Cancer: New Dimensions. Cancer Discovery Recommended Hanahan D, Coussens L (2012) Accessories to the Crime: Functions of Cells Recruited to the Tumor Microenvironment. Cancer Cell Action items Points of reflection

item.title: Orientation and the first 6 hallmarks
item.description: Readings should be completed before the actual lecture. The lecture itself is intended to provide a deeper exposition of the material and provide additional insight. Required Please read the Overview for the course and familiarize yourself with the content at OWL.1 Please read the Resources for the course. The Hallmarks of Cancer Hanahan and Weinberg (2000) Cell. Volume 100, Issue 1. Recommended Please make sure that you understand the concept of quiescence and how it differs from normal cell cycle.
